title: Giant Machines 2017 (v1.1.2) [Steam-Rip] (Multi-9)
description:
Giant Machines 2017 (v1.1.2) [Steam-Rip] (Multi-9)

1. Mount the image, install the game.
2. Copy the contents of the SmartSteamLoader folder 
   into the folder with the installed game.
3. Start the game - SmartSteamLoader.exe.

*** Change language in the game:

Open "SmartSteamEmu.ini" with any text editor, and in the line "Language = ********", 
specify any language required.

Language: 
Russian, English, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Czech, Hungarian 

Unlike the Giant.Machines.2017-CODEX release,
this Steam-Rip has all the updates, and accordingly fewer bugs
